Krhinos: Good! Set out as soon as I give the word. I don't think it'll
be long yet.

The station came out of the warp just above Earth. The perfect
opportunity!

Krhinos: Hey Rukus! We there yet?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> Dracon rubs his chin  and nods.
> 
> "I'm pretty confident I can get the job done for ya, and quickly. 
You boys go do your thing."
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Friday, June 20, 2003 6:33 PM
>   Subject: Re: StarDrill Inc.
> 
> 
>   Krhinos: Do you think you'd be able to set the camp while Rukus and I
>   place the station in orbit?
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
>   > Dracon walks over to a compartment in the designated corner.  It
>   seemed that all  the essentials were here.  First he isolated the
>   equipment from the two bombs and then began to bring it out.  He picks
>   up about half of it in his arms and then lugs it over, bringing the
>   rest next.
>   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   From: Nic 
>   >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   >   Sent: Thursday, June 19, 2003 9:31 PM
>   >   Subject: Re: StarDrill Inc.
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   Krhinos: Alright, Rukus. The warp won't be long, so keep an
eye out on
>   >   the other side. I want to be warned of anything unusual.
>   > 
>   >   He took hold of a metal crate twice his size and moved it in
the cargo
>   >   hold of the large transport shuttle. The crate contained
nothing else
>   >   than much of the necessary item to establish a base camp onplanet.
>   > 
>   >   Krhinos: Dracon, get the mining equipment from that corner
inside, but
>   >   leave the two bombs here.
>   > 
>   >   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
>   >   > --Rukus--
>   >   > 
>   >   > "Alright Krhinos." He replies, then checks the safe distance
from 
>   >   > the station, and then turn on his comm again, "Prep for launch. 
>   >   > Engines firing..." The engines charged up and being
propulsing the 
>   >   > ship.
>   >   > 
>   >   > 
>   >   > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
>   >   > > Krhinos: Please, no countdown. Just engage the drives when
>   we're in
>   >   > > range so we can get there and establish a camp as soon as
>   possible.
>   >   > > Dracon, meet me in the cargo bay. We'll load a shuttle
that we'll 
>   >   > send
>   >   > > down.
>   >
